root.name: Naval Warfare
root.description: OverviewIn an alternate world of Victorian architecture and industrial contraptions, war is lead mainly by means of aquatic machinery. The player takes the role of a ship commander and must eradicate his nation from invading enemy forces, as well as a mysterious new warmonger.PC System RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista, Windows 7Processor: Intel or AMD Dual-Core Prozessor (1.9 GHz) or betterRAM Memory: 2GBHard Disk Space: 1.5 GB hard drive spaceVideo Card: NVIDIA Geforce GTS250 / ATI Radeon HD4800 or betterDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0cSound Card: DirectX 9c compatible
